short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock profile and cover photos of any locked users on facebook and download photos, videos on Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this browser extension, you can easily view up to 5 variant of profile pictures and the cover photo of any Facebook user who has set their profile to private.
Also you can download any videos and photos of any Instagram users. Also you can download DP or profile picture of any Instagram users.

Here's how it works on Facebook:

1. Log in to your Facebook account.

2. Go to the profile of the Facebook user you want to see photos of.

3. Right-click anywhere on the page.

4. You'll notice a menu labeled 'I Can See You' with an eye icon. Hover your mouse over this menu.

5. You'll see various buttons that allow you to view the user's photos.

6. Simply click one of these buttons, and the full photo will open in a new tab window.


Here's how it works on Instagram:

1. Log in to Instagram.

2. Go to the profile of the person you want to download photos or videos from.

3. Right-click anywhere on the page.

4. You will see a button that says "Download Profile Picture". Click it to open the profile picture in a new tab. You can then right-click and save the photo.

5. You can also open any other photo or video on the page and right click to see options "Download Photo" or "Download Video" Clicking it will open the video or all images in a new tab and from there you can save them.

This extension comes in handy when the user is not in your friend list and has locked their Facebook or Instagram profile. These photos are not accessible directly on Facebook and Instagram due to the removal of graph search functionalities. This extension is the only way to make this possible.
